text: Coal Chamber is an American nu metal band from Los Angeles, California. The band formed in 1993. ==Discography== ;Studio albums * Coal Chamber (1997) * Chamber Music (1999) * Dark Days (2002) ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website Category:1993 establishments in California Category:1990s American music groups Category:2000s American music groups Category:2010s American music groups Category:Musical groups established in 1993 Category:Musical groups from Los Angeles Category:Nu metal bands Category:Roadrunner Records Category:2003 disestablishments in the United States Category:Musical groups disestablished in 2003 Category:2000s disestablishments in California Category:Musical groups established in 2011 Category:2011 establishments in California
title: Coal Chamber
